meanings.definition: A small ornament or decoration, typically found on clothing or accessories.
meanings.sent1: She added delicate dobbies to her dress for a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The dobbies on his hat sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The dobbies on the scarf made it look like a tiny garden.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with colorful dobbies that brightened up the space.
meanings.sent5: The dobbies on the bracelet were so intricate, they looked like tiny flowers.

meanings.definition: A small, rounded lump or bump.
meanings.sent1: He felt a small dobbie on the back of his head.
meanings.sent2: The dobbie on the carpet made it hard to walk smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The dobbie on the tablecloth caused the glass to wobble.
meanings.sent4: The dobbie on the road made the bicycle ride bumpy.
meanings.sent5: She noticed a tiny dobbie on the surface of the cake.

meanings.definition: A type of knitting stitch that creates a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: The sweater had intricate dobbies that added texture.
meanings.sent2: She practiced the dobbie stitch to make a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent3: The dobbie stitch reminded her of little hills on the fabric.
meanings.sent4: The scarf had a row of dobbies that looked like tiny waves.
meanings.sent5: The dobbie pattern on the hat made it stand out from the rest.
